import React from "react"; import { Col, Row, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import products from "../products"; const ProductScreen = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const product = products.find((p) => p._id === id); return ( Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: ${product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock' } ); }; export default ProductScreen;
